title: Can we have "RIOT" or anything like RI0T etc in our names?
body: Or will we get banned if we do?

replies.body: Can't have "Riot" in your name, though apparently "Rito" is allowed.
Not even that (probably), it appears too similarly to "RiOt" I'd say.
The system will prevent you from having riot in your name

ok just wondering since when you go to change your name it takes about if it is incorporate etc they will reverse it without getting RP back. So just making sure i don't do anything stupid before I rename myself :)
